name: split-lease-monorepo

scripts.build: cd app && bun install --frozen-lockfile && bun run build
scripts.start: cd app && bun install --frozen-lockfile && bun run build
scripts.dev: cd app && bun install && bun run dev
scripts.deploy: node app/scripts/check-branch.js --require-main && cd app && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name splitlease
scripts.deploy:dev: node app/scripts/check-branch.js --block-main && cd app && bun run build:dev && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name splitlease --branch development

description: Split Lease application monorepo - Cloudflare Pages deployment - Root directory: app
